search_string: AND[OR[Toddler*, OR[Kid, kids], PICU*, "Intensive Care Units, Pediatric"[ab], P#ediatric*, "Pediatrics"[ab], Neonat*, Newborn*, Infanc*, Infant*, "Infant, Newborn"[ab], OR["Infant"[ab], "Infant, Hospitalized"[ab], "Infant, High Risk"[ab]], Child*, OR["Child"[ab], "Child, Hospitalized"[ab], "Child, Medically Fragile"[ab], "Child, Preschool"[ab]], Youth*, Teen*, Adolescen*, "Adolescence+"[ab]], OR[Ventilation Weaning*, ventilator* weaning*, "Ventilator Weaning"[ab], "Ventilators, Mechanical"[ab], NEAR[ventilat*, liberation*], ventilator*, respirator weaning*', "Respiration, Artificial"[ab], reintubat*, proportional assist ventilat*, "Pressure Support Ventilation"[ab], pressure controlled ventilat*, positive-pressure ventilat*, "Positive Pressure Ventilation"[ab], Positive End Expiratory Pressure*, "Positive End- Expiratory Pressure"[ab], peep, open lung ventilat*, neurally adjusted ventilatory assist*, mechanical ventilat*, "Mandatory Minute extubat*, "Extubation"[ab], NEAR[adaptive, support ventilat*]], OR[OR["airleak test*", "leak test*", NEAR[leak, extubation*], NEAR[leak, endotracheal], "tube leak*", "cuff leak*", Cuffleak*, "leak Antiinflamator*, "Anti inflammator*", "Antiinflammatory Agents"[ab], Prednison*, "Prednisone"[ab], Methylprednisolone*, Predonine*, prednisolone*, "Prednisolone+"[ab], Cortisone*, Hydrocortisone*, Glucocorticoid*, "Glucocorticoids+"[ab], "Cortical steroid*", "Cortico steroid*", Corticosteroid*, Corticoid*, adrenocorticosteroid*, NEAR[OR[adrenal, adreno, adrenocortical, corticoadrenal], OR[steroid*, hormone*]], "Adrenal Cortex Hormones"[ab], Dexamethasone*, "Dexamethasone"[ab]]]]
